CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial;Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property
JUDGES: Alvina Gyulumyan;Anatoly Kovler;Corneliu Bîrsan;Egbert Myjer;Elisabet Fura;Josep Casadevall
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was convicted of assault and battery and sentenced to DATE imprisonment .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG quashed the judgment of DATE on supervisory review and discontinued the criminal case against the applicant for the lack of corpus delicti in his actions .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of GPE awarded the applicant MONEY ( RUB ) against ORG in compensation for the non - pecuniary damage sustained as a result of wrongful conviction and unlawful detention . It also ordered that ORG reimburse the legal fee paid by the applicant in the amount of RUB CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG increased the award to RUB CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of ORG , acting on supervisory review , increased the award to RUB CARDINAL . The judgment became enforceable on DATE . On DATE the court issued a writ of execution .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant submitted the writ of execution to the local office of ORG which forwarded the writ to the central office of ORG . ORG received it on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG returned the writ to the applicant because he had not indicated his bank details and had not submitted a certified copy of the judgment of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant resubmitted the writ to ORG . On DATE the Ministry returned the writ to the applicant for the same reasons as before .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant submitted the writ to the local bailiffs’ service . On DATE the bailiffs forwarded the writ to the GPE bailiffs’ service . On DATE the GPE bailiffs’ service returned the writ to the applicant and advised him to submit it to ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant for a third time submitted the writ to ORG .
CARDINAL . The applicant received the award on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant submitted the writ of execution to the local office of ORG which forwarded it to ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG issued a duplicate writ and sent it to the local bailiffs’ service . On DATE the bailiffs opened enforcement proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE the bailiffs forwarded the writ to the GPE bailiffs’ service .
CARDINAL . NORP By letter of CARDINAL DATE , the GPE bailiffs’ service informed the applicant that the writ had been returned to LOC on DATE for corrections in the debtor ’s name and address .
CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE the applicant asked ORG to issue a duplicate writ of execution . The court issued a duplicate writ on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant submitted the writ to ORG .
CARDINAL . NORP The applicant received the award on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant submitted the writ of execution to ORG .
